Text:
If anybody dislikes the PDF version, then don't whine; instead, Google "Convertfiles", upload "Halo_ Silentium - Greg Bear" in there, press "convert", and then download the converted file.

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR UPLOADING THIS, BLACKTAR!
^upload the .epub version to the Convertfiles site, not the pdf version.
So would this be a good download? I've been wanting to read the third book for awhile now and can't be bothered to get a physical copy. Download was quick so I should know soon.
Oh, thank god. I've been going nuts, trying to find this damn thing. Thank you so much, BlackTar.

Damn bro you beat me to it. I had a kindle that had this book on it but could not find it anywhere within the files. Could you tell me how to managed to find it? I have no problems stripping drm just finding the dammed files. I could only find a hand full of books within the books dir. The book was bought on amazon and then transferred to the kindle via wifi and is not stored on the cloud (at least I don't think it is.) any insight would be a preciated. 

Thanks 
~R3DOX
